pages.text: inna evhayna ileyke kema evhayna ila nuhiv vennebiyyine mim ba`dih. veevhayna ila ibrahime veisma`ile veishaka veya`kube vel'esbati ve`isa veeyyube veyunuse veharune vesuleyman. veateyna davude zebura
verusulen kad kasasnahum `aleyke min kablu verusulel lem naksushum `aleyk. vekelleme-llahu musa teklima
rusulem mubessirine vemunzirine liella yekune linnasi `ale-llahi huccetum ba`de-rrusul. vekane-llahu `azizen hakima
lakini-llahu yeshedu bima enzele ileyke enzelehu bi`ilmih. velmelaiketu yeshedun. vekefa billahi sehida
inne-llezine keferu vesaddu `an sebili-llahi kad dallu dalalem be`ida
inne-llezine keferu vezalemu lem yekuni-llahu liyagfira lehum vela liyehdiyehum tarika
illa tarika cehenneme halidine fiha ebeda. vekane zalike `ale-llahi yesira
ya eyyuhe-nnasu kad caekumu-rrasulu bilhakki mir rabbikum feaminu hayral lekum. vein tekfuru feinne lillahi ma fi-ssemavati vel'ard. vekane-llahu `alimen hakima
